meetings.name: In-Person Gaming Night
info: Meeting location
Dice Tower Cafe & Gaming, 24 London St, Basingstoke, RG21 7NY
Games to bring
Anything you think they might not already have that you'd like to play
Gaming duration
They close at 10pm, and they start to kick us out then, if we haven't already left of our own accord.
